classes

Class UserList

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.UserList

  • public class UserList
extends java.lang.Object
    The UserList class contains the global list of users in one machine, read in by .ser files stored in the data directory. This class also reads and writes to the .ser files as well as checks to see if a user attempting to log in has provided valid information.
    Author:
    Nicholas Petriello, Samuel Uganiza

      static boolean DEBUG 
      static boolean generateStock
      Controls whether or not the stock user is generated.

    • Method Detail

      • getUsers

        public static java.util.ArrayList<classes.User> getUsers()
        Returns the user list.
        Returns:
        The user list

      • getUser

        public static classes.User getUser(int index)
        Returns a user at the given index.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of user to get
        Returns:
        The user at the given index

      • addUser

        public static boolean addUser(java.lang.String name,
                              java.lang.String pass)
        Creates a new user object to add to the list and updates the database. Prohibits adding same user name multiple times, case specific. Called when creating an instance through login add button and admin add button.
        Parameters:
        name - The user name to add
        pass - The user's chosen password
        Returns:

      • deleteUser

        public static void deleteUser(int index)
        Searches database for the given user name and deletes it, deleting the corresponding .ser file from the database.
        Parameters:
        index - The index of user to remove

      • readFromUserDatabase

        public static void readFromUserDatabase()
        Instantiates the user list from the data directory by reading the names of .ser files. If no data directory was detected, the data directory is empty, or the data directory only contains the stock photos directory, this will simply create an empty static reference to the user list.

      • writeToUserDatabase

        public static void writeToUserDatabase(classes.User user)
        Updates the user database by writing changes to the given user's .ser file.

      • verifyFromUserDatabase

        public static int verifyFromUserDatabase(java.lang.String name,
                                         java.lang.String pass)
        Checks to see if the given user name and corresponding password exists in the user list. Returns the index of a user if it finds an exact match, and an error code if it does not find any match.
        Parameters:
        name - The user name to verify
        pass - The password to verify
        Returns:
        The index of user object either with valid credentials or an error code

      • removeExtension

        public static java.lang.String removeExtension(java.lang.String fileName)
        Removes the file extension from the given file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The file name with an extension
        Returns:
        The file name without the extension

      • addStockUser

        public static void addStockUser()
        Adds a stock user account to the list of users with pre-determined file locations. Only run once per program start-up.
